caption: Merge All PDFs using
doc: Merge the entirety of a list of PDFs together.

ABN.caption: Merge all PDFs by supplying a list of their URLs. Use Bubble's :filtered and :sorted to arrange the list into your desired order.
ABN.name: info

ABQ.caption: Filename
ABQ.doc: Name to give your file WITHOUT THE .PDF EXTENSION.
ABQ.name: filename

ABt.caption: Use base64 Strings
ABt.doc: Use this checkbox if you want to pass base64 strings (instead of file URLs) to the PDF Merger; this option allows for direct-download of files without needing to save to the database.
ABt.name: use_base64_strings

ABu.caption: Output as base64 String
ABu.doc: Use this checkbox if you want the PDF Merger to output the final, merged file as a base64 string (instead of a file URL that saves to the database); this option allows for direct-download of files without needing to save to the database.
ABu.name: output_as_base64_string
